website_summaries.verdict: If you like all the photo apps for your smartphone camera but miss having an optical zoom, the Samsung SH100 is the point-and-shoot for you.
pros: The Samsung SH100 has features tailor-made for people wanting the functionality of their smartphone camera in a point-and-shoot
cons: The SH100's low-light photos are not good and its performance can be slow
Also, wireless uploads are limited to 2-megapixel photos and 30-second low-res movie clips

customer_reviews.title: *** Samsung EC-100 ***
customer_reviews.text: Just received this camera a few days ago. Camera functions are great (picture, video, etc.) Included software is not user friendly. Wireless works just fine. I wish they would have included software that lets you select a group of pictures on the camera and rename them and store them where ever you want. All in all, it's a great camera. I bought it for the wireless function, and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy pictures and difficult-to-navigate controls
customer_reviews.text: It could be a function of my not having learned how to use the camera fully yet, but so far I've not had good luck with taking really good pictures. They tend to be either fuzzy and/or the colors are washed out. I got it primarily b/c of the wifi feature -- and that seems to work ok. Again, it could just be that I'm not far enough down the learning curve quite yet. Oh - and note that I'm fairly technical (wife always calls me a geek) - so it's not b/c I'm an idiot.
customer_reviews.author: Tygur90

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Compact
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Compact, Easy to use, worth the price, I would buy again, but I won't have to because I don't forsee needing to replace it anytime soon. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chrea Jones

customer_reviews.title: nice sharp pictures as well as video compact design and ...
customer_reviews.text: nice sharp pictures as well as video compact design and lot of features. I did not able to work the Android app for remote picture taking.
customer_reviews.author: midwesterner

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this Camera, It did great for 2 years. Unfortunately the screen cracked after 2 years which was outside of my warranty. Because its a touch screen none of the functions work besides the one you were using before the screen cracked, In my case it was in video mode so i can only record videos with it now. Really Considering buying this same camera again, thats just how much I loved it. I would highly recommend buying this camera, with a warranty of course.
customer_reviews.author: Keantae

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great camera, you can upload your pictures straight to your Facebook account and it take wonderful pictures. I recommend this camera to anyone wanting a small compact camera.
customer_reviews.author: Marlisha E. Hairston

customer_reviews.title: Wifi camera at an affordable cost!
customer_reviews.text: have not given it as a Christmas present as of yet...tried it out and it is high quality... Not sure how functional the stylus will work...
customer_reviews.author: TPS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes this camera is what I was looking for Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Great Camara
customer_reviews.text: Great photos, and Ican upload them to facebook or social network directly, easy to use and setup, compact and fast
customer_reviews.author: neuggim gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: takes good pictures and the wifi is perfect for me. i really hate having to do a certain number of words on each review though. makes me want to just not d reviews at all.. i guess the amazon gestapo requires it.
customer_reviews.author: michael m.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value in WiFi Camera
customer_reviews.text: Samsung has built a great pocket camera with WiFi. Its a tremendous value and is fun to use and send photos. Only shortcoming is that some controls are small and not easily read.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Not enough quality
customer_reviews.text: Actually I expected the quality of pictures to be better. The photo quality was slightly better than my Nokia 5800's. And seems the box was opened.. It doesn't really looked like a new. So, I'm a bit dissapointed with this camera. Touchscreen, and everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This camera was on Clarence for 100 and it was well worth it! It's easy to use and takes awesome pics even in the dark :) I wanted something that would be good to take with me anywhere and this is it! Zoom isn't the absolute best but it's a small camera so it is expected. I love this and it took only 6 days for it to come in!
customer_reviews.author: DT22

customer_reviews.title: samsung H 100
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pictures, battery last a long time, the only drawback it has is, the is too short . does everything I expected and more !
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: It works well. I can upload the picture instantly on FB. Overall, I'm happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Random Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use for a basic camera it is not overloaded with a lot of stuff the layman will never use.. good pictures, nice looking. I can really only say I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jarust

customer_reviews.title: No lag time- good camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good camera. I'm still messing with all the options it has. Pic quality is pretty good for point and shoot. My concern was the time lag between pics or pressing button to take pics and it's great. Seller was great about shipping out on time. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Meyzen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMARAS I HAVE PURCHASED 8 OF THEM AND HAVE GAVE THEM OUT TO OTHERS1111
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GREAT WIFI CAMARA..IT WORKS AS ITS SAID IT WOULD....GREAT PICTURES AND THE SCREENS WORKS FANTASTIC!!! BUY IT!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great pictures. Easy to send to e mails and face book.

customer_reviews.title: its great
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I expected and my daughter loves it! She can post right to facebook or email pics too right fromn the camera with ease!

customer_reviews.title: My friend love it
customer_reviews.text: The camera is good for the price.. bought it for my friend.. He loves it and is very please with it,,,

customer_reviews.title: samsung wi-fi digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Just make sure you buy an sd card for it. It doesn't come with it and you need it to take pictures there is no internal memory. Nice and small and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for... Slow to take pictures, quality so so...
customer_reviews.author: Juan P.

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered earlier than expected and brand new like advertised. I will definitely order from here again
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered earlier than expected and brand new like advertised. I will definitely order from here again! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Oman

customer_reviews.title: Great graduation gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a graduation gift for our grandson. He is really into computers and state of the art products. Let me say he just loved the camera. He shot video out the window of our truck right away and took many stills of family and friends. All came out fantastic for such a small camera. It was purchased so he could take it on his trip to Alaska where he is staying with his uncle. He has posted many beautiful pictures of his trip on YouTube. He just loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: very good !!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very stylish with a good image, it connects to the wifi perfectly, very easy to use that I recommend very good
customer_reviews.author: Cristopher E. Pulido P

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in the estimated time by amazon prime. It's my first time buying electronic devices via internet. I am pleased with the price and conditions of the camera. I did not like the package did not come sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar O. Polanco

customer_reviews.title: WiFi design is not so good
customer_reviews.text: The camera is lightweight, easy to put in the pocket. I bought this camera mostly because of the WiFi feature. After search the web, I didn't found too many cameras with WiFi. However, the WiFi design of the camera is very poor. The operation is not user friendly and worse than most devices with WiFi I have ever seen. The reception is worse than all other WiFi devices in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: quick and great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders and would not give it u p for the world. Easy to use. Price was more then worth it and love the wick.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: horrible dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I hate it the pictures come out blurry 99.9% of the time
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: does everything as advertised. A great product. Be sure and order a micro sd card because that's all it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Banner man

customer_reviews.title: Heed the warnings - I didn't!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I chose to overlook all of the reviews that said their camera couldn't connect to wifi - unfortunately, I found this to be true as well. I tried using it in Chicago and even in my own home I couldn't connect to my open network and now I'm in Barcelona and am having no luck here either. I am returning the camera. Besides the wifi issues, it just doesn't take very good photos. The touch screen is fun and cool, but definitely difficult to see in bright light.
customer_reviews.author: RS1933

customer_reviews.title: I love it. perfect condition, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says. Its everything you can ask for in a quality digital. This seller will have my buisness in the future as well. If you are thinking of ordering. Go ahead and do it. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: dethstark

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my daughter in honor of her high school graudation. She has fell in love it! She loves taking pictures with it!
customer_reviews.author: Shana L Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Freezes when using smart movie mode
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this camera for about 9 months. I could never get the wi-fi to connect to my computer but it wasn't that big of a deal to plug it in. About a month ago it started freezing up when I used Smart Movie Mode. I tried a different SD card, hoping that would help but it didn't. The pictures are ok, but not great. The menu's are a little complicated for the manual controls. The touch screen is hit and miss with accepting input. Overall, I'm pretty disappointed in the camera and will probably avoid Samsung in the future.
customer_reviews.author: VJK

customer_reviews.title: Terrible in low light situations
customer_reviews.text: I needed a camera to take pictures of my childrens' performances for school. This camera is awful! Maybe I am doing something wrong, but I've had it for a year now and I cannot get a decent picture indoors. Also, it is so incredibly SLOW!!! I do not recommend this product if you need it for mostly indoor shots. If anybody has a recommendation on an affordable digital camera that does good in low light situations, I would appreciate your feedback!
customer_reviews.author: Janna Y.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: OK, the considering it's price and that it has wi-fi built in I would say it's ok, but just to share and upload pictures (or files I should say). Now if you want quality pictures in this camera it's another story....not to mention that it creates the 720p lowest quality videos I've ever seen. Very bad in low light, seriuosly I'm saying all this because I had to resell the camera after 2 months of using it.........to take pictures go for Canon, Nikon or Pentax. Now on the other side this camera is great for uploading low STD quality pictures and videos ti the web, great for bloggers. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: hdeambro

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures. With the 14mp sensor, you can really enlarge and show great detail. The stylus works pretty well on the touch screen. Mine, though, has some trouble responding to the stylus when I try to click on one side of the screen. I have to click a few times in that area, once for the other side. Weird!
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is one of Samsung's top of the line cameras including a touch screen. It is durable and lightweight at the same time. It will also last a very long time and will not need to be replaced any time soon. I would highly recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee S. Ferguson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: bad bad
customer_reviews.text: one celle nokia n8 take much more more better the pictures that this camera. If you want one camera take to see the leica of panasonic,
customer_reviews.author: La Retro Colombe

product_meta.title: Samsung EC-SH100 Wi-Fi Digital Camera with 14 MP, 5x Optical Zoom and Touchscreen (Black)
product_meta.description:
Enjoy the Connected Life (Fun, Easy and Fast)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Post, share, or email your favorite moments on the move with the Samsung SH100 14-Megapixel Wi-Fi Digital Camera. With Wi-Fi-enabled technology, the Samsung SH100 makes uploading photos to social networks as simple as shooting them. Its 3-inch touchscreen lets you navigate intuitively and intelligently, while the 14-megapixel resolution with 5x optical zoom captures images and videos in exceptional detail, even up close.



SH100 Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Black)
At a Glance: * Wi-Fi technology lets you email photos, or upload to Facebook or YouTube
   
   
 * 3-inch LCD touchscreen with drag-and-scroll functionality
   
   
 * 14-megapixel resolution with 5x optical zoom for high image quality
   
   
 * Face/smile/blink detection to help capture the perfect shot
   
   
 * Wireless, automatic file backup to your PC
   
   
 * One-year limited warranty on parts and labor


Features 5x optical zoom for crisp close-up photos and videos. View larger.
Wi-Fi-enabled technology lets you directly upload photos or videos to social networking sites. View larger.
Smart Touch interface features familiar drag-and-scroll functionality for easy operation. View larger.Share Photos and Videos Wirelessly
With the Samsung SH100, you can share special moments and exciting information on the move. Upload photos to Facebook, Picasa, or other sites, or send an email directly from the camera. The AllShare wireless connection allows you to upload stills or videos to your TV. You can also upload videos to YouTube easily and quickly.Easy Operation with Smart Touch Interface
The Samsung SH100's Smart Touch interface makes operation as easy as using the touchscreen on your smartphone. The 3-inch LCD features familiar drag-and-scroll functionality, along with a "Home" selection so that you can easily return to the home screen, no matter what you're doing. The crisp LCD display makes it easy to see what you're shooting in virtually any light.

Smart Auto 2.0 Creates the Perfect Shot
Using Smart Auto 2.0, the Samsung SH100 captures the perfect shot by analyzing key composition elements and selecting from 17 different photo and 4 different movie modes.

Thanks to its face/smile/blink-detection feature, the Samsung SH100 detects and adjusts the lighting on up to nine different faces at a time. The camera will automatically shoot the subjects when they laugh or smile, and prohibit the shot from happening if anyone's eyes are closed.

Digital Image Stabilization for Sharp Focus
When you're shooting in low light or zooming in on a shot, or when your camera is unsteady, digital image stabilization helps eliminate blurry results. This feature stabilizes your photos by changing their path to the image sensor before they are recorded digitally. As a result, your photos come out sharp and ideally focused.

Use Advanced Effects with Magic Frame
Create sophisticated images and poster-quality visuals with the Samsung SH100's Magic Frame feature. Magic Frame uses a predefined template to merge two photos into one. Select a background and the area where you want another photo. Place the captured image into the background and combine. The image you attach takes on the texture of the background.

Preview and Control Images with Remote Viewfinder
The Samsung SH100 includes a remote viewfinder feature in conjunction with your Samsung Galaxy Phone, so you can preview images and control the zoom using your smartphone. Many Android smartphones now feature a GPS feature, hence all of your images will embed geo-tagging to record your location.

Equipped with a wireless auto-backup feature, the Samsung SH100 automatically downloads your latest image and video files when it's within range of your PC. The camera even turns itself off after to save energy.

Product, Compatibility, and Warranty Information
The Samsung SH100 is equipped with a 26mm Samsung lens, a 5x optical zoom, and a 3-inch LCD touchscreen. It offers 6.9 MB internal memory, and accepts external microSD cards up to 8 GB. It uses a rechargeable lithium-ion battery. The camera measures 2.12 by 3.66 by 0.74 inches (H x W x D).

To use the SH100 with your computer you'll need an Intel 4 3.2 GHz or later or AMD 2.6 GHz or later processor; at least 256 MB ram; a USB port; a CD-ROM drive; and at least 250 MB hard-disk space with a Windows system (110 MB with Mac). The camera is compatible with Windows 2000, XP, Vista, and 7, and Mac OS X 10.3 or higher.

The Samsung SH100 is backed by a one-year limited warranty on parts and labor.

What's in the Box
Camera, AC adapter/USB cable, rechargeable battery, strap, touch pen, user manual CD-ROM, and quick start manual.
feature_bullets: Wi-Fi technology lets you email photos, or upload to Facebook or YouTube
14-megapixel resolution with 5x optical zoom for high image quality
Face/smile/blink detection to help capture the perfect shot
Wireless, automatic file backup to your PC
